favourite.article: I don't want to withhold anything. I give You all that I am. Please, Lord, let Your love constrain me..

Yes...Lord Jesus this is my prayer,...grant me a heart that is always true to You. Never doubting You. Never backsliding but instead always viewing Your great love. Though our family's situation is not pleasant at this time still I trust You Lord Jesus. I give my all to You...what a privilege to love You.
Lord "I love You! I just love You!"
Lord, I reeeeeeeeeeeally love You!
Praise Lord for our brother Howard Higashi's love of the Lord. May we grow to love the Lord in the way expressed by this song.
Oh,Lord You are the best of all in the whole universe. You only deserve our all being we give it You gladly. We love You Lord!!!
Lord, my heart is pure and sees only You. Lord, my heart loves You and treasures only You. Keep my heart always true to You. I love You, Lord.
Your love constrains me to give my all to You. I love You Lord dearest Lord. I love You. I just love You!
Your love constrains me to give my all to You!! My life and my future, Dear Lord, is all for You!!!! I love You Lord Jesus ❤❤❤❤
My heart is drawn to You, Lord!
Lord I just love You!!
His love constrains us to give out all to Him! Lord we give our all to You!
I love You, Lord, dearest Lord. I love You! I just love You!
Oh what a privilege! O Lord I give myself to You because Your Love constrains me to draw near on You. Lord keep my heart always true to You For my life and my future is all for You
Amen
Your loves constrains me Lord.
Lord my life and my future is all for You :D
Lord keep my heart always true to You. What a wonderful experience of the Lord to write these words.
Lord Jesus I really do love You.
O Lord Jesus! I love You! Lord, always keep my heart true to You. You are so sweet!
Lord please always keep my heart true to You. Oh Lord I present to You.

It wasn't until You drew me Lord unto You that I was able to experience the divine Genuine Love only You can Give. Praise You Lord for it truly is a privilege to be loved and to access Your Love!!! :-)
Your Love constrains me, I give my all to You! I Love Lord, I just Love You! Keep my heart burning for You, keep me hot for You! I Love You Lord Jesus
Lord, keep my heart always true to You!

Lord, thank You that You gave to us the opportunity to give ourselves to You. Truly that my life and my future is not for my self, but all of this is for You. I will give myself to You, Lord. I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS.
O Lord this is we always pray, that by Your grace and mercy our heart would be keep only unto You no matter what happen, never backsliding but always viewing You.
Amen! Oh Lord Jesus! Keep my heart always true to You, dear Lord! Constrain me with Your love! :)
Lord preserve my heart till You come. Make it burning and brighter for You. Lord Jesus I love You...

It is an triumphant and victorious song for me whom interwoven in my life. Of course, it my favorite hymn and I pray to the Lord that I want to be one in this song by taking Christ as my everything. Saints I want you to be seen in the New Jerusalem. PTL

Oh.....this song touch me very much. Oh, I really like this song. This reminds me to keep my hearts always true to the Lord Jesus. O Lord Jesus, please, Lord, keep my heart always true to you so I can love You more. Lord, You are the only One in my heart. No one can be bigger than You in my heart, just You, Lord—the biggest One in my heart. Oh, please come into my mind too, Lord. Amen, Lord. I love You, Lord. I just love You, Lord.

O Lord Jesus, make our hearts always true to You even when we are experiencing ups and downs in our church life, as we know You're always here for us to let our spirit burning and let our love stays to You. Lord, I consecrate myself to You.
I love this song...oh Lord, thank You Lord...Oh I love You Lord...Keep my heart always burning for You.
This song reminds me to keep my heart always true to the Lord. Thank You Lord for Your love that constrains me to give my all to you.I love You Lord, I just love You.
Hallelujah! This song is lovely, Praise the Lord.

I owe so much to my earlier Christian walk to brother Howard Higashi. His songs are written in my heart and I sing them always because they are written with the Spirit of Christ flowing through a humble vessel.

I was not a happy camper back in 1983-1984 when I was serving in Irving. Howard Higashi invited me to lunch and I got to be built with this brother. It was refreshing and it alleviated my pains that I was going through. Did you knew he grew up in Hawaii and hung out with Filipinoes? He enjoyed "pinakbit"!! Me too, a real native dish!!! Howard wrote, "Lord, keep my heart".
I really love this song. It soothes my heart.

I love this song, does anyone know where I can find the sheet music so I could have someone play it on the piano or music on CD with no words that only has piano in the back?? Please let me know thanks
Lord, keep our hearts pure and true to You.
este imno nos ase realisar qe el senor es nuestro unico amor aleluiaa te amo senor oh senor Jesus oh senor Jesus!!!!!
Wow, I love this song!
Lord, keep our heart always true to You. Continue to preserve and keep us in the church life for Your purpose.

Lord, keep my heart always true to You.
Praise the Lord. This is more a declaration of love that we share together. We ''and' 'the Lord. We love your care for us. It is a privilege to give ourselves totally to Him The Lord is our true love. He loves it so good. ''Oh! Lord Jesus I give myself entirely to Thee, Thine is my heart, I love You Lord. Oh! Lord Jesus, my life, my future, dear Lord, everything is for You'.' Amen.

Lord, You know how I love You. Thanks for life and love You gave me even more opportunities I have missed You. You still continue to love me. Bring me always to be one with You for me to enjoy You to the uttermost.
Amen!Lord keep my heart always true to you.I really love you.Give me a heart that is pure only love you.Your love constrains me to consecrate myself to you.Thank you Lord.

I love this song because it's really touches me. Oh Lord keep my heart always true to YOU. There are a lot of things that my heart loves other than You. My heart is not pure, forgive me for this. I just want to love You to the uttermost.
Today, watching once again the testmony of Bro. Howard Higashi, and being touched again. Thank our precious Lord so much for preparing all kinds of conditions to gain me. Praise the Lord!
Lord, keep my heart...Guarda o senhor meu coração..OH SEIGNEUR JESUS. This song touches me so much...since now
Amen, praise the Lord that God is always true to us. Amen. We love You so much, LORD.
Jesus You're the only light for me, and I will keep my heart always true to You.

Yes Lord... keep my heart from all impurities, from this attractive things in world, which is the vanity of vanities, sanctify my heart always to be pure, clean and single, seeking the things for Your economy. You know Lord my heart is mixture. Thank You for Your grace and mercy. Wherever I go use me Lord, especially You put me here in this place because You have a plan. Thank You Lord for loving me and my husband. We love You in return. Thank You for a new start. I consecrate myself again to You so that I have nothing on my own; only just for You. I love You, Lord Jesus. Preserve my whole life until the end: Your coming back or until I die. Thank You Lord for the priviledge!!!

Lord, I just wanted to say to You that I love You. I cannot love You all by myself, but Lord, by Your grace and mercy, You will keep my heart always seeks, loves, finding, treasures, and keeps You in my heart. There are a lot of times Lord that I felt so down and empty, but You'll always there for me. I can't help but to cry, but this cry is not an emotional cry, but it's just because of Your love that never fails away. Lord, use me Lord for Your economy. Lord, use me. I love You, Lord Jesus.
It's precious, really precious!!!!!!! Keep my heart Lord, it's all Yours!!!!!!
Lord, keep my heart always true to You! I love You, Lord!
I really appreciate the first line of the first stanza, "Lord, keep my heart always true to You." It's touching me more and it gives me a dispensing of what the Lord He is. AMEN.

Este himno es precioso y de gran bendición para mí. Es hermoso ver cómo el amor del Señor Jesús es tan grande que siempre está disponible para nosotros, nunca se agota y siempre es fiel. La letra en español también es bellísima: "Guarda Señor hoy mi corazón, puro y sincero sólo para ti, que no se desvíe, que te ame a Ti y que te contemple y mire sólo a Ti. CORO:Tu amor me atrae a consagrarme a Ti, me has cautivado, te entrego todo a Ti, qué privilegio:Rendí mi ser a ti;eres mi amor, oh Señor, te amo, te amo Señor". Greetings from BARRANQUILLA'S CHURCH, COLOMBIA!!!
The melody is so so beautiful and marvelous! The lyrics is truly touching my heart!! Oh Lord Jesus, what at privilege I can give myself to You. Dearest Lord, I love You with all my heart!!!

O what a song that Brother Higashi has written to shared with us. It's truly simple yet profound and full of meaning. It touches my whole being. I really love singing it to You, Lord again and again. I can't help it, my heart is all for You.
Oh! How Your love constrains me to You! You draw me nearer and nearer each and every day! I just love You!
Amen! Lord cause us to have our heart always true to You. Lord keep us from drifting away and backsliding. May we be faithful to You as You are to us.
Lord, keep my heart always true to you!

Amen. Thank You Lord for keeping my heart always true to You. Never backsliding, always viewing You. A heart that is pure that sees only You. A heart that loves You and treasures only You. Amen. Hallelujah for the Body.
I was once lost and now I am found, only through Jesus Christ, only in love of Jesus, He is the way, the truth and the life.

Praise the Lord. Also, thank the Lord for Bro. Howard Higashi. I just thank the Lord for such a brother who really, really loves the Lord-that we are all drawn closer to Him. Our brother labored much for the young people in the Philippines. I was gained back to Him through our brother's labor of love. Now... my all is for Him! It is such a priviledge to offer our all to the Lord, even if my all are all "nothing," "dung," "refuse." Lord Jesus, I love You!!!
I love this song. Although the lyrics is simple, I find it touches my heart the first time I heard that. Really, this song is amazing for me!
This song is marvelous! The Lord really loves you! So, we have to give our hearts to Him and always say "I love You Lord, dearest Lord, I just love You."
Lord in Your mercy, take hold of me. Never allow me to me drifted away from You. Your love will sustain me.

This song is so marvelous. Whenever I hear this hymn I'm always touched by it no matter what condition I'm in. Sometimes I feel there is no love for the Lord in me. But when I hear this song I am really constrained by the Lord's unconditional love. Each and every word of this hymn is so meaningful, loving and so much touching. I am really at loss of words.

How beautiful is Thy Name, Lord Jesus! Every time I sing or listen to this hymn or just read the verses; my spirit is lifted to a deep feeling of peace and I feel the real connection to the True One in the universe. Dear Lord, I give myself to You again and again for the building up of Thy Bride for Your coming back.

I met my wife and sister in the Philippines. A Christ brother In dipolog-city gave me this song on a cd with hyms. This song show me the deep light of Jesus Christ. Always when I hear or sing it touch me. Yesterday in an international meeting in Holland we sing this song with many brothers and sisters from all over the world.

The first time we sang it, it was just like nothing to me until, we kept on singing it in the meetings, I realized how is my heart unto the Lord. So i keep on praying,"Lord, keep my heart always true to You, Never backsliding, always viewing You, A heart that is pure that sees only You, A heart that loves You and treasures only You."

Composer Howard Higashi lives on with this song and his great love for the Lord as well as for the Body. See "OPEN WINDOWS" Issue 15 Dated September 2003. Praise the Lord for having this beautiful song!

This song really blesses me. I just cry when I read these words and pray them to the Lord. This song expresses how I feel. I love the Lord with all my heart and I just want to draw closer to Him and never backslide and just only see Him. He is everything to me. Thank you for such a beautiful song.

Many times when I feel drifted away from the Lord and preoccupied with so many things. This song reminds me that I'm not for this world, our hope and everything is our Lord Jesus. Lord I just pray that when my heart turns away from You and my first love grows cold. Lord reveal more of Yourself and keep my heart open and true. Lord I want to give my heart to You. When I come to know You through the brothers and sisters my life changed, Lord I can't help but give myself to You. Lord Jesus I love You!

Praise the Lord to all bro. and sis. in the whole wide world. I like This song because giving me a goose bumps, and of course this is one of the hymns played on the day I've gotten married. So inspiring! Likewise my husband has not yet received the Lord, but he loves Him. I can tell. Hallelujah for that. Amen!!!
Praise the Lord. Lord, keep my heart always true to You! A heart never dwindling always viewing You!! Lord Jesus!!

What a wonderful song! How precious we are saints that we receive Christ as our Savior! We must always keep in touch with the Lord! Whatever circumstances we encounter we don't have to worry because He is inside our heart! Hallelujah!

We just sang this amazing song at the gathering last night. It also will be one of the songs at a brother's wedding for today! We just want to say our dearest Lord, we love You and we present ourselves to You!
Lord, keep my heart always true to You!

I like this song because when I'm singing this song it makes me always raise up to loves Christ and make me to remember about my consecration to the Lord. May this song be my prayer. I love Jesus. My life and my future is all for YOU, JESUS...
I love this song very much. Lord, let us love You deeply. Thank You for loving us and saving us from sins. Praise You forever!!!

Praise the Lord for the recovery! Praise the Lord for the ministry! Lord, keep my heart, always and always true only to You! Oh Lord Jesus... Thank You so much for Your sweet name! "My life and my future, dear Lord, is all for You."
Lord, all I just need to do is to keep loving You... Lord, recover my first love to you.... Oh Lord Jesus, I love You!!! Amen.

Praise the Lord. Yes, we need to keep our hearts always true to Him. Love Him with all our hearts never backsliding, a servant of the Lord serving with joy, a sweet sweet responsibity. It's just a joy and I can't help it I love Him deeply. Praise the Lord. Halellujah.

We should love God with all our being. Our love for Him should always be fresh everyday. Let no one separate us from pursuing the Lord! Let us put our spirit into flame. Praise the Lord...This is what the song is bringing to me...

I love this since I was a little kid. We have to realize that our Lord so love us, yet a lot of times we limit Him...May the Lord reveal more of Himself into us, loving Him with our best and first love. He is the only person that can guard our heart from every defilement. May the Lord be graceful and merciful to us. Praise the Lord. Amen!!!
I like this song because it reminds me to give everything to the Lord. Lord keep my heart always true to You. I give to You everything! O Lord Jesus I love You!

I really love this song! This is a particular song that best describes our true heart to the Lord. Everytime, i feel so down and far from HIM, this song will automatically played in my heart that keeps me coming back to HIM..

This hymn make my tear drop. when hard situation comes, it really hard for me to keep my heart true to lord. But our lord always supply us and fill us whenever we pray and call on his name. Oh lord Jesus ~

This song never fails to refresh me.Many times my love for the Lord declines but this song reminds me to love the Lord everyday like the day I first touched Him. May we keep praying this song to the Lord.

This song touch my heart, I could pray this prayer everyday. Lord I love you, you are the air that I breath, you are my portion Lord and the song remind me that I should kindle the love inside me each day for you Lord.
Lod JEsus I Love You..always keeep y heart pue unto you
This is one of the most beautiful hymn which touches me deeply and I like it very much. It recalls my love to the Lord.
This song really touches my heart.everytime i feel down this song really helps me to come back to the Lord..LORD KEEP MY HEART ALWAYS TRUE TO YOU...

I just loved this song because it reminds me that in myself i cannot love the Lord but because of His love it contrains me to love Him. I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS and I CONSENTRATE MY ENTIRE BEING TO YOU...

I cannot help it but to thank you so much for sharing this song. I have never prayed this prayer before. Lord, keep my heart always true to You. It will be my theme from now on.
Thank you

this songs makes me cry everytime i sing. i'm so touched esp. when i feel like i'm getting cold due to some negative situation. I just want to say "Lord keep my heart always true to You, never backsliding, always viewing You, Keep my heart burning brightly for YOu." We really need the LOrd and we should be always constrained by His love so that we will give Him everything..even our life and future.Praise the LOrd!
this hymn really touches my heart. it keeps me coming back to HIM. "O Lord, keep my heart always TRUE to you". May we all have a prayer like this until HE comes!
O Lord sometimes my heart is not honest to you...Lord forgive my sin... Now i open my heart for You dwelling in... Lord Jesus my heart is all Yours Lord....! Amen!

well i really like this song. much more thing make my heart isnt pure in the lord.. if i feel down or feel so far with lord i always listen and sing this song..and come back to the Lord jESUS and commit again.. "i always pray, Lord keep my heart always true to YOU,and give me a pure and sincere heart to Love You",i know i;m weak person but I have Lord Jesus Always give me a strength..
Halleluya we have JESUS CHIRST in our life.. God bless

I like this song because it reminds us of how our heart should be open and soft for the Lord to make His home. I love this line, 'Oh what a privilege!' praise the Lord. Lord I give myself to You, Lord I just love You.
"Lord, I just love You" - is my real deep feeling. I'm ready to write my name under each words of this hymn.
I like this very much... it causes my heart to love only Him... WE LOVE YOU LORD JESUS!!!!!!!

I just want to consecrate myself to the Lord today! I don't want anything to come between. I just enjoyed this song because of His love. We really don't have any love. Our love is God's love. We are just vessels that can contain God's love! I give my whole being to You Lord Jesus! Hallelujah! Put me on the cross each day so that I can gain more of You Lord! Praise the Lord!

I love this song beause it reminds me that everyday I need to consecrate myself to the Him and even my life and my future it is all for the lord. Especially in the days of my youth there are a lot of things in the world that sometimes it hinder us. Lord, keep my love, heart, always true to You. I love You, Lord Jesus Christ! Amen.

I like this song because it reminds me of how weak we are in ourselves and that we constantly need to keep calling and turning to the Lord asking Him to increase our love for Him so we can love Him the way He loves us. LORD JESUS WE LOVE YOU!
I liked this song because everytime I heard this song I will pray to Lord: "Lord, my heart must always true to You and I love you Jesus. You are my dearest Lord." Amen.

I don't know whether my heart is always true to the Lord. Many times have i kept wondering if i'm really loving the Lord. All i wish is that the Lord would love me more and that He will attract me more and more each day, hence keeping my heart always true to Him. Keep my heart always true to You, Lord...

Why I like this song? The reason is within its lyrics. It is a song I would pray over after a restless day of being caught up in the world. I especially like the fact in this song, it says that loving the Lord is a PRIVILEGE. Amen.. This song reminds me to always keep my heart open. The Lord is being sweetly patient, and is diligently waiting for us to love Him, why not love Him? OH LORD JESUS, I LOVE YOU!
Loving the Lord is the sweetest thing we can ever do in our entire life.
This song is calm and peacful and allows me to concentrate on my work when I am frustrated or angry.

This song always brings me to prayer that the Lord will keep our hearts true and burning for Him. Lord, burn away any unhealthy desires, thoughts, and intentions in our hearts. Keep us from being carried away by the teaching of Balaam, the teaching of the Nicolaitans, and the teaching of Jezebel. Keep us all in the healthy teaching of the apostles. Let all our hearts be renewed to love you like the day we first met you.

Why I like this song. The heart is where the Lord wants to make His home (Eph. 3:17a), because the Lord is a Gentleman, everything depends on our cooperation. The heart is composed of three parts, the mind, emotion, will plus the conscience, which is the leading part of our spirit. How wonderful to know our God wants us to be His home for His corporate expression and also to subdue the earth and have dominion over it (Gen. 1:26-28). Oh how precious it is to have hymns like this to encourage us to love the Lord and cooperate with Him by His "constraining love"-I love You Lord, dearest Lord, I love You, I just love You! AMEN.
Myself is fragile and my heart is easy to stick on many things. I like this this song because it expresses my prayer, Lord keep my heart. I need Him to keep my heart....

Each time this hymn is played, my whole spirit lifts up to pray to my Lord and be one with Him. Many times, the world entices us and draw our attention. This hymn just reminds us to turn back and ask the Lord to keep our hearts single and absolute for Him.

I love this hymn very much. Everytime I play this hymn, it makes me to just simply turn back to the Lord. A hymn so sweet, a reminder that my goal is Christ Himself. Day after day I feel the Lord is sweeter and dearer than He ever was before.

To my surprise, I am listening to "Lord, keep my heart..." like for the first time on this site now. I was trying to search for hymns on loving the Lord to recommend to one of my colleagues. Yesterday, I shared with him concerning loving the Lord Jesus.
I must say that the timing of the hymn is perfect. I was immediately drawn to the Lord at the opening strains of this hymn. The flavour and emotion just flowed with the tempo, melody and words. This is one of those unforgettable hymns that have made an impact on my life.

I learned this song three years ago, when I was in 1 month perfecting training.I love this song very much!
This hymn affect my living and draw me nearer and closer to my Beloved One - the LORD. I usually cried when I sang this song to my LORD. I feel sorry to Him for I've been not loyal and true to Him all the times. But I know.....He is always there with me.....and He still loves me as well.....LORD, I give my heart, myself, and everything to YOU!
Please gain me in this very age, oh LORD... keep my ...Heart..............
A prayer of His beloved.
I like this song because I am conscious that my heart is so fragile and I need the Lord to keep it. I want to always be with the Lord. And really His love is the only thing that attracts me to Him.

It is deep, very deep cry out to the Lord from my heart/spirit when I sing this song to Him. Praise the Lord! He is able to lead us to love Him more. God already promised to give this pure/new/true heart to us (Ezekiel 36:26) and it is now in the all-inclusive Spirit. We need to come to the Lord everyday, every moment to ask Lord to realize it in us.
I like this song because I am conscious that my heart is so fragile and I need the Lord to keep it. I want to always be with the Lord. And really His love is the only thing that attracts me to Him.
The song is soothing to me when I listen to it. I feel closer to God when I hear it. Helps me to think about the days events and some other things. I really enjoy listening to the song.
It is a restful and emotional song and I love it.

I had very much been enjoying this song when I received a letter from my firstborn son, who is in prison. He is taking a class in horticulture there. The Lord had mercy on him because his "lab" (we can call it) is in a greenhouse. He said that when he was in there, that it was his time to be alone and spend time with the Lord. He asked me to send him the words to some songs that would keep him. He requested "Nothing's quite so precious" and any others that I could think of that he knew the tune. I have sent both of them to him. This song runs through my mind quite often, drawing me to the Lord, then to pray for my son. It is very comforting to think that sometimes he and I could be singing this song to the Lord at the same time.
